entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
